info.title: MITA (Money Intelligence Task Assistant) API
info.description: Comprehensive API for MITA - Personal finance management platform with AI-powered insights, spending prevention, OCR receipt processing, and behavioral finance tracking. **Total Endpoints: 327+**

post.summary: Admin: Revoke all tokens for a user

post.description:

post.description:

get.summary: Get current budget status for all categories

BearerAuth.description: JWT Bearer token authentication. Obtain tokens via `/auth/login` or `/auth/register` endpoints.

can_afford.description: Whether user can afford this transaction

password.description: User password (minimum 8 characters, must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number)

refresh_token.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens
